messages.title: Stand Up For Our NHS
messages.content: Use Britain's wealth to invest in health. Reverse the decline in funding for the NHS and plug the deficit hole that's been created. Plant the seeds for a new and flourishing public health service. Ensure that the NHS is only funded by public money, delivering services itself, not through private companies.

messages.title: Stand Up For Renters
messages.content: Ensure that when you rent a home, you feel at home. Introduce rent controls to prevent huge annual increases. Build 500,000 socially rented, affordable new homes for thousands of families. Introduce a Landlord Licensing Scheme to ensure that every landlord must adhere to minimum standards.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Use Britain's wealth to invest in health. Reverse the decline in funding for the NHS and plug the deficit hole that's been created. Plant the seeds for a new and flourishing public health service. Ensure that the NHS is only funded by public money, delivering services itself, not through private companies.

Ensure that when you rent a home, you feel at home. Introduce rent controls to prevent huge annual increases. Build 500,000 socially rented, affordable new homes for thousands of families. Introduce a Landlord Licensing Scheme to ensure that every landlord must adhere to minimum standards.
